Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.game.Behaviour

        • org.sontana.game.Actor

  • public abstract class Actor
extends Pawn
    Actors are objects in a Scene that are rendered and react to input.
    Author:
    Christophe Simon
